title: Tottenham 'ready to launch January move for Barcelona midfielder Carles Alena'
text:
Tottenham are ready to launch a bid to sign Barcelona midfielder Carles Alena in January, according to reports in Spain.

Mauricio Pochettino is preparing for life after Christian Eriksen, who is expected to leave at the end of the season after failing to secure a summer move to Real Madrid or Manchester United.

The midfielder's contract expires in eight months' time and Pochettino has begun to draw up a shortlist of potential replacements.

Tottenham are reportedly set to make a move for Barcelona midfielder Carles Alena in January

The midfielder is growing tired at lack of opportunities, having only played once this season

Mundo Deportivo claim that Pochettino is keen on 21-year-old Alena, who is also attracting interest from Real Betis.

The Spaniard has been given limited playing time under Ernesto Valverde this term, playing just once against Athletic Bilbao on the opening day of the season.

Pochettino, who identified Alena as a possible replacement for Eriksen in the summer, has revived his interest in him at an opportune time with the midfielder growing tired at his lack of first-team chances.

Alena has been at the club for 14 years and wanted to be part of Valverde's first-team plans this season, but has instead found himself playing second fiddle to summer signing Frenkie de Jong.

Reports claim that both Tottenham and Betis will continue to monitor his situation and are considering making a move for him when the window opens in January.

However, Pochettino recently refused to say whether the club would delve into the January transfer market to solve any of their problems.

Spurs boss Mauricio Pochettino identified the Spaniard as a possible target in the summer

Alena is on a shortlist of replacements for Christian Eriksen, whose contract expires in July

'I am clear with you. I don't say yes or no,' he said after Saturday's 1-1 draw with Watford. 'I don't say we are going to sign or not sign, sell or not sell.

'It is not the moment to talk, when the time arrives we are going to take that decision in one way or another.

'Now is the time to stay all together, all of the squad, with the staff and the fans and try and change the atmosphere.'
description: Mundo Deportivo have ran a story claiming that Tottenham are considering making a January move for Carles Alena. Mauricio Pochettino has identified him as a possible replacement for Eriksen.
